thread.title: The Unbelievable Story of How a Georgia State Rep. Passed a Bill to Examine a Rape Kit Backlog
thread.title_full: The Unbelievable Story of How a Georgia State Rep. Passed a Bill to Examine a Rape Kit Backlog

author: Hemant Mehta
title: The Unbelievable Story of How a Georgia State Rep. Passed a Bill to Examine a Rape Kit Backlog
text:
March 30, 2017 by Hemant Mehta Leave a Comment 
This segment from last night’s Full Frontal will bring a smile to your face even though the subject matter couldn’t be more serious. 
Georgia State Rep. Scott Holcomb tells the unbelievable story of what he had to go through to pass a common sense bill requiring a huge backlog of rape kits to be examined. Republican State Sen. Renee Unterman tried to block his efforts — as did a long-winded priest, inadvertently — but other Republicans found a way to back him up. 
See?! Government can do the right thing. Sometimes. Even when a bunch of fools try and get in the way.
